snippet.title: PC Longplay [152] Clive Barker's Undying (Part 1 of 5)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Zuljaras

The main character Patrick Galloway, who has participated in World War I, is called by his good friend Jeremiah Covenant. The so called "Irish man" has traveled all around the World to investigae unknown and supernatural forces and of course if the people payed him he will gladly take the job. But on the battlefield Patrick was badly injured and Jeremiah saved him and now he owed his life to his old friend. Soon patrick realises that his mission is to uncover the secrets of the Covenant family. Only one thing is for sure HE is not wanted there! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
